N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4822.22 - Badges

State Regulations

The principals and all employees of the licensed
commercial lessor and the food facility operator shall wear badges approved by
the commission, containing the name of the wearer, the wearer's title or
employment, photograph and the name of the licensed commercial lessor or food
facility operator. Guards furnished by a watch, guard or patrol agency under
contract to provide such service must have a badge and/or insignia indicating
(a) the name of the agency-employer and (b) the name of the guard. Such badges
or insignia shall be worn and visible to the public at all times when such
persons are on the premises of the licensed commercial
lessor. Notes
